headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MORAN, JOSEPH W.

lead_paragraph: MORAN--Joseph W.,BS, MAAA, FSA, BSI, ASH. Joe Moran, Actuary, "Sherlockian", 86, died February 18, 2014, Mamaroneck, NY. Born November 22, 1927 in Cleveland, OH, to Charles F. and Mary (Gans) Moran, graduated Yale in 1949, Phi Beta Kappa. New York Life Insurance Co. 1949-1992. He is survived by his brother, Richard T. Moran, of Wyoming, OH; his step-mother, Eliner Moran, of Cape Coral, FL; three children, Douglas (Laura) of Denver, CO, Kathleen of Minneapolis, MN, Clifford of Ridgefield, CT; and four grandchildren: Sarah Moran, Dennis Moran, Erica Moran, and Lisa Moran. He was a member of the Baker Street Irregulars and the Adventuresses of Sherlock Holmes. Memorial Service Saturday, March 1, 2014, 11:00am at Larchmont Avenue Presbyterian Church, 60 Forest Park Avenue, Larchmont, NY. Reception to follow in the church hall. Donations to the Larchmont Avenue Church's "Faith in our Future" Centennial Fund, (www.lacny.org), or the Beacon Society (www.beaconsociety.com). More information at http://jjffh.com/book-of-memories/1808445/Moran-Joseph/obituary.php
